name: OPERATION OCEAN
description:
Dive and dash to catch the trash before it hits the ocean floor!

Made in about 3 days for the SEAJAM - #TeamSeas Game Jam! 

DEVLOG COMING SOON

CONTROLS:

  • Use W  or up arrow to move forward and S or down arrow to move backwards.
  • Use A and D or left and right arrow to turn.
  • Press Space to dash.

All art and assets made by me except for music and sounds:

A Cute Song by DreamHeaven

Link: https://filmmusic.io/song/6274-a-cute-song

License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license

Sound from Zapsplat.com
